amendment.description: To limit liability with respect to the owners of rented or leased motor vehicles.

action.text: SA 2327 fell when SA 2311 was ruled non-germane.
Amendment SA 2327 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2311. (consideration: CR S971; text: CR S971) To limit liability with respect to the owners of rented or leased motor vehicles.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2327 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2311.
